H0.text: Mel Gibson (1990) and Kenneth Branagh (1996) have both played which character in movies. Macbeth

A4.text: Gibson's roles in the Mad Max series of films, Peter Weir's Gallipoli (1981), and the Lethal Weapon series of films earned him the label of 'action hero'.
